scripts.content: console.log('🔄 behaviors/editor.jsonを読み込み中...'); fetch('/editor/behaviors/editor.json').then(r => { console.log('📡 Fetch完了:', r.status); return r.json(); }).then(behaviorDef => { console.log('✅ JSON解析完了:', behaviorDef); window.jsoniaRuntime = new JsoniaRuntime(); window.jsoniaRuntime.init(behaviorDef); console.log('✅ JsoniaRuntime初期化完了'); }).catch(err => console.error('❌ 読み込みエラー:', err));
